    GWAS GWAX LTFH Prediction Writing Efficient R Code and Working with Large Datasets

    Prediction Cross-validation

    Prediction_cross_validation.Rd

    Function to calculate predictive powers of different models

    Usage

    Prediction_cross_validation(
  person,
  k = 10,
  threshold = 0,
  disease,
  method = "GWAS",
  liabilities = person$FAM$Status
)

    Arguments

    person

    A .rds file with an FBM.code256 and accompanying FAM and MAP.

    k

    Number of folds to be used in cross-validation. Default is 10.

    threshold

    Vector of P-values to be used in thresholding. Default does not use thresholding.

    disease

    List with properties of disease.

    method

    Method to use for prediction. Possible methods are "GWAS", "GWAX", "LTFH". Default is "GWAS".

    liabilities

    Vector of liabilities used for prediction with "LTFH" method. If not specified, uses "GWAS" method instead.

    Value

    A list with 3 values: a tibble with average and best scores for each threshold, the best score, and the best model.

    On this page
